articles.author: hello@smashingmagazine.com (Adrian Bece)
articles.description: The View Transitions API is a new ‚Äî but game-changing ‚Äî feature that allows us to do the types of reactive state-based UI and page transitions that have traditionally been exclusive to JavaScript frameworks. articles.title: The View Transitions API And Delightful UI Animations (Part 2)

articles.author: hello@smashingmagazine.com (≈†ime Vidas)

But, as ≈†ime Vidas explains in this deep dive, `100vw` does not always represent the full width of the viewport due to differences in how browsers handle scrollbars.
